    • Class thiefworld.agents.ActiveAgent extends Agent implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5597485865861516823L

      • Serialized Fields

        • carriedFruit

          double carriedFruit
          The fruit quantity which the agent currently carries.

        • carriedMeat

          double carriedMeat
          The meat quantity which the agent currently carries.

        • gatheringSkill

          double gatheringSkill
          The agent's skill for gathering fruit.

        • gatheringSuccess

          double gatheringSuccess
          The gathering success rate of the other agents which the current agent interacts with over time.

        • health

          double health
          The agent's current health level.

        • huntingSkill

          double huntingSkill
          The agent's skill for hunting.

        • huntingSuccess

          double huntingSuccess
          The hunting success rate of the other agents which the current agent interacts with over time.

        • maxAllowedFood

          double maxAllowedFood
          The maximum allowed food quantity that can be carried at once.

        • personalObserver

          Observer personalObserver
          The observer which keeps track of the other agents within its observation range.

        • personalSuccess

          double personalSuccess
          The agent's success rate on performing the current role it has.

        • stagnatingFor

          int stagnatingFor

        • stealingSkill

          double stealingSkill
          The agent's skill in stealing food from other teams.

        • stealingSuccess

          double stealingSuccess

        • switchThreshold

          double switchThreshold
          The agent's disposition towards changing its role.

    • Class thiefworld.agents.Pheromone extends Agent implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -1180313912816310627L

      • Serialized Fields

        • comingFromNest

          boolean comingFromNest
          Flag describing whether the pheromone was placed on the path from the nest towards a food source.

        • returningFromFoodSource

          boolean returningFromFoodSource
          Flag describing whether the pheromone was placed on the path returning from the food source or going towards the food source.

        • strength

          double strength
          The pheromone strength. This will eventually influence the number of time steps in which it completely decays.

        • type

          PheromoneType type
          The type of pheromone.
